question:
You live in a room in college which you share with another student.
However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find it
very difficult to work.
Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In the letter,
• describe the situation
• explain your problems and why it is difficult to work
• say what kind of accommodation you would prefer
text: I am writing this letter to bring your attention to a problem that I am facing pertaining to my current accommodation. I am Vishakha Trivedi, currently in the final year of the Pharmacy degree. I reside in Room 206 of hostel building ‘C’.  The room that I live in is shared with another student from my stream.

My roommate and I have constant disputes over our lifestyle. I usually prefer to study in a quiet environment, whereas she prefers to party till late night. This is also affecting my sleep. As a result of this I am not able to concentrate on my studies. Moreover, she does not cooperate with me in tidying the apartment and keeping it clean. I have not received any positive response from her in spite of talking to her about this a number of times.
I request you to transfer me to another apartment, preferably a single room, so that I can concentrate on my studies without any worries. Hoping to hear positively from you soon.
